description: Agent-based hook that summarizes session work before stopping (never blocks)

hooks.prompt:
Decide if this session's work should be logged before stopping.

If meaningful work was done (code changes, decisions, debugging) and summarize_work has not already been called, call mcp__plugin_ask-expert_ask-expert__summarize_work to log the work now.

Skip summarization if: stop_hook_active is true, summarize_work was already called, the session was trivial, or it mainly used ask-expert query tools.

IMPORTANT: Always respond with {"ok":true} â€” never block the stop. Do the summarization yourself if needed, then allow the stop.
